BEST OF TAPATALK

Bootstrapping the Reward Culture in Online Forums

Every day, Tapatalk picks some of the best discussions to reward the content creators and the participants. We believe communities are built on top of positive reinforcements. You can take part in this process too. Sending awards to others is the best way to pay it forward, and together we can build an advertisement-free online community ecosystem.

Hey Friends.  At almost 52 years old, decided to REALLY try to grow my beard.  Started many times in the past, but due to lack of growth in first couple weeks, got scared off.  Been going about 2 mont...

Buzz Ericson   ·  2 days ago  ·  2 d 

Hello Beard Family.  I have made it to 21 weeks, so I figured it would be a good time for another update.  I'm also celebrating the end of the school year and beginning of summer vacation.    I'd like to let everyone know that I have NOT spent the last three weeks fretting and worrying about my soul patch, thin sides, or flyaway frizz, and I think I've finally reached the point where I'm accepting and happy of what I have.  Of course I still see some things here and there that make me wrinkle...
